collector: country with low data protection standard than european union
text: If they process your data outside the European Union, this may mean that your data is transmitted to a country with a lower data protection standard than the European Union.

These service providers may generally only process your data on our behalf under special conditions.
We work particularly closely with certain service providers, for example with technical service providers (e.g. running computer centers, cloud platform for storing the data) or with logistics companies or payment gateway service provider.

Please note, however, that we may need to retain certain information for record keeping purposes, to complete transactions or to comply with our legal obligations.
Privacy Policy

How we store, use, and access, your information.
The Company also collects information regarding the type of personal computer/mobile devices & tablets/ any other digital device use to access our services or application being used to access the Services.
This information will be used by us to address your query, to provide and improve the services.

Our Company uses "Cookies" to collect information which includes, without limitation, third-party cookies like Google and Facebook.
Our services use three categories of Cookies: Necessary Cookies: These Cookies are required for optimal navigation and operation of the Site.
Our services use three categories of Cookies: Statistical Cookies: These Cookies collect device and access data to analyze the use of the Site, such as which areas of the Site are used how (so-called surfing behavior), how fast content is loaded and whether errors occur.

We may share information about you with a third party if we believe that sharing is reasonably necessary to (a) comply with any applicable law, regulation, legal process or governmental request, including to meet national security requirements, (b) enforce our agreements, policies and terms of service, (c) protect the security or integrity of our products and services, (d) protect, our users or the public from harm or illegal activities, or (e) prevent, detect, mitigate, and investigate fraudulent or illegal activities related to the Site.
With your consent : We share information about you with third parties when you give us consent to do so.

We may share information about you with a third party if we believe that sharing is reasonably necessary to (a) comply with any applicable law, regulation, legal process or governmental request, including to meet national security requirements, (b) enforce our agreements, policies and terms of service, (c) protect the security or integrity of our products and services, (d) protect, our users or the public from harm or illegal activities, or (e) prevent, detect, mitigate, and investigate fraudulent or illegal activities related to the Site.
With your consent : We share information about you with third parties when you give us consent to do so.

We will store your usage data as long as is necessary for the purposes named in the Policy, especially for the fulfilment of our contractual and legal obligations, or until such time when you request for its deletion.
